Text:
Thank you for sharing, I've been looking to replace the old worn out vinyl copy for a long time.

Please tell Bob that his gap settings in EAC is undefined and therefore the CUE sheet is bad. - In EAC, load a CD, hit F4 to detect gaps, in the menu select Action, make sure to tick "Append Gaps To Previous Track (default)".

Copy/paste the following to create a proper CUE sheet. It is burn-tested against AccurateRip.

REM GENRE Rock
REM DATE 1989
REM DISCID CE116C10
REM COMMENT "ExactAudioCopy v0.99pb5"
PERFORMER "Foghat"
TITLE "The Best Of Foghat"
FILE "01. Foghat - I Just Want To Make Love To You.wav" WAVE
  TRACK 01 AUDIO
    TITLE "I Just Want To Make Love To You"
    PERFORMER "Foghat"
    PREGAP 00:00:32
    INDEX 01 00:00:00
  TRACK 02 AUDIO
    TITLE "Maybelline"
    PERFORMER "Foghat"
    INDEX 00 04:19:20
FILE "02. Foghat - Maybelline.wav" WAVE
    INDEX 01 00:00:00
